GroupInfo.title: Use Case "SEQ" - Queries based on Sequence
GroupInfo.description: Although sequence is not significant in most traditional database systems or object systems, it can be quite significant in structured documents. This use case presents a series of queries based on a medical report.

test-case.name: seq-queries-results-q1
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: In the Procedure section of Report1, what Instruments were used in the second Incision?

test-case.name: seq-queries-results-q2
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: In the Procedure section of Report1, what are the first two Instruments to be used?

test-case.name: seq-queries-results-q3
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: In Report1, what Instruments were used in the first two Actions after the second Incision?

test-case.name: seq-queries-results-q4
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: In Report1, find "Procedure" sections where no Anesthesia element occurs before the first Incision.

test-case.name: seq-queries-results-q5
test-case.Creator: XML Query Group
test-case.description: In Report1, what happened between the first Incision and the second Incision?
